note.title: Version Information
note.para: &susemgr; 3 was originally released as a SLES 12 SP1 extension. With the next maintenance update (2017), &susemgr; 3 will be based on SLES 12 SP3 and it will support SLE 12 SP3 clients officially. In the following sections and chapters, it is highly recommended to use SLE 12 SP3 instead of SP1 or SP2.

sect1.title: SLES 12 KVM Requirements
sect1.para: This chapter provides the required (kvm) settings for installation of &sls; 12 SP3 media as the base for the &susemgr; 3. A kernel virtual machine (kvm) combined with Virtual Machine Manager (virt-manager) will be used as a sandbox for this installation.
Enter the following settings when creating a new virtual machine using virt-manager.

entry.para: Local install media (ISO image or CDROM)
103 GB split between 2 GB swap and 100 GB mounted at: /var/spacewalk/

sect1.title: SLES 12 KVM Settings
sect1.para: This section provides guidance on installation of &susemgr; utilizing the full installation media with KVM and virt-manager. This section assumes you have previously setup an account with SCC and downloaded the SLES 12 SP3 full installation media.

step.para: In virt-manager select File then New Virtual Machine.
Choose Local install media (ISO image or CDROM).
Ensure Use ISO Image is selected then click Browse and locate the full SLES 12 SP3 image you downloaded from your SCC account.
Configure your machine with at least 4096 MB RAM and a minimum of 2 CPUs.

Create a storage device with a minimum of 200 GB storage space for the installation. (During the partitioning setup of the SLES 12 SP3 installation this disk should be partitioned into a 4 GB swap a 100 GB partition for /var/spacewalk/ (XFS) and an additional 50 GB partition for /var/lib/pgsql/ (XFS). The remaining storage space will be used by the operating system). Select Finish to begin installation.

sect1.para: Installation of &sls; 12 SP3 will begin. For more information on completing an installation of &sls; 12, see .

sect1.title: Selecting the &susemgr; 3 Extension
sect1.para: During the &sls; 12 SP3 installation you will be presented with the Extension and Module Selection (see ). Select the &susemgr; 3 Extension and then complete the &sls; 12 SP3 installation. This new extension will install &susemgr; 3 and configures &susemgr; as a Salt-master by default.
